title: Google is preparing a way to hibernate your Chromebook to help save power
content:
It will soon be possible to hibernate your Chromebook instead of simply putting it to sleep, allowing it to conserve even more battery while not in use.

more…

The post Google is preparing a way to hibernate your Chromebook to help save power appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: It will soon be possible to hibernate your Chromebook instead of putting it to sleep, allowing it to conserve battery while not in use.
